title: Bridgewater County: The Complete Series
description: In this contemporary version of Vanessa Vale's USA Today bestselling Bridgewater County series, five women discover true love, the Bridgewater way. Two men for every bride. It's not 1885 anymore and still...one cowboy is never enough. This full series boxed set includes Ride Me Dirty, Claim Me Hard, Take Me Fast, Hold Me Close, Make Me Yours and Kiss Me Crazy.
author: Vanessa Vale
